body:
Comment 12 by **bill.derose11**: 
The code snippet here http://play.golang.org/p/IchkNr7uhOexhibits the same behavior
described in the initial post. I am currently working with Go 1.0.3 and there still
appears to be bug with the closures.
When I print file name at the end of each closure, it is always the last string in the
array.
